title: At Ukraine’s Request, Starlink Denies Internet Access to Russian Troops
summary_full: It’s unclear what effect the change will have on Russia’s ability to wage war, but Russian military bloggers said troops were experiencing internet outages that hampered frontline communications.
summary_public: It’s unclear what effect the change will have on Russia’s ability to wage war, but Russian military bloggers said troops were experiencing internet outages that hampered frontline communications.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Starlink Denies Internet Access to Russian Troops

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: At Ukraine’s Request, Starlink Denies Internet Access
